high_descs: Walk to the bed behind you.
Grab a green pillow from the bed.
Walk to the edge of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow under a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bed.
Pick up the green pillow that's on the bed.
Turn around and walk until you're even with the light on the dresser to your right and when you are even with it turn right and walk to it.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pillow by lamp light.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the bed.
Pick up the green pillow closest to you, on the right corner of the bed.
Turn around and go to the dresser to your right.
Turn on the lamp on the back, left corner of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
